title: The Official Guide for GMAT Quantitative Review 2017(2016)Gooner
description:
The Official Guide for GMAT Quantitative Review 2017 (2016) (Pdf) Gooner

Publisher: John Wiley & Sons; Pap/Psc edition (14 Jun. 2016)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1119253918
ISBN-13: 978-1119253914

GMAT quantitative review, tips, and strategies, with over 300 practice questions

The Official Guide for the GMAT Quantitative Review 2017 provides targeted preparation for the mathematical portion of the GMAT exam, with 45 brand new practice questions. Designed by the Graduate Management Admission Council, this book shows you everything you need to know to go into the exam with confidence. Youâ€²ll learn how best to approach the quantitative section as a whole, and how to approach each type of question to understand exactly what is being asked. An inâ€“depth math review helps you recall important concepts and techniques, while 300 problems exclusive to this book provide plenty of opportunity for practice. All problems include answers and explanations to help you pinpoint mistakes, and the companion website (gmat.wiley.com) allows you to create your own custom problem sets to focus on specific areas in need of improvement. Online videos provide additional tips and strategies from the examâ€²s creators, and extensive discussion of the testâ€²s content gives you an advance preview of exam day.

The GMAT holds the key to your graduate education, so if youâ€²re feeling the pressure, youâ€²re not alone. Thorough preparation is key, and this book is your ultimate source of quantitative review, practice, tips, and strategies.

* Review essential algebra, geometry, arithmetic, and word problems
* Practice solving 300 quantitative problems with explanations included
* Learn valuable testâ€“taking and problemâ€“solving strategies
* Access to an online question bank with customizable practice sets exams at gmat.wiley.com

Great exam prep eases your mind by confirming how much you already know, and highlighting what you donâ€²t know while thereâ€²s still time to correct it. With quantitative skills, practice makes perfect and The Official Guide for the GMAT Quantitative Review 2017 combines authoritative insight with over 300 practice problems for the ultimate in targeted GMAT prep
